document_data.name: Paldir
document_data.mainbody: '''Paldir''' was a small island in the [[Pirate Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: Paldir was found in far southeast region of the Pirate Isles.
document_data.Description: Its shores did not offer much protection from incoming storms. A large mountain dominated the landscape of the island. Gigantic stone reliefs were carved into the cliffs leading up the mountain. Some of these carvings reached a height of {{SI|1000|ft|long=yes}}. They appeared to depict a tale of ancient conquest. Glyphs were found with each of the carvings, though scholars and sages were unable to decipher them through normal or magical means.
document_data.Inhabitants: This island was mostly inhabited by ex-pirates and fortune seekers who left the island for a more protected one during the winter months.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Rumors persisted that unlocking the secret of the giant carvings would yield great treasure, drawing all manner of fortune seekers to the island.
